summary: Frontend testing of CapCut-style Editor layout with 50/50 split and drag-drop functionality. All 12 requested features verified and working. Layout correctly implements: Upper half (50%) with Media Panel (360px) + Preview, Lower half (50%) with Timeline, Right panel (280px) spanning full height, Sidebar navigation (130px compact). Drag-drop code verified in MediaInputPanel.jsx and TimelinePanel.jsx.
